DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Medically stable , ambulatory , surgically menopausal woman , 2160 year age , undergone bilateral salpingooophorectomy hysterectomy least 6 month study entry Serum total testosterone concentration less 31 ng/dL free testosterone le 3.5 pg/ml ( less median healthy , young woman Able understand give inform consent . The woman stable regimen transdermal estrogen replacement least three month . Those estrogen replacement take different mode estrogen replacement include willing switch transdermal estradiol patch ( see ) . A normal PAP smear ( subject cervix ) mammogram precede 12 month . Significant depression , assess Beck 's Depression Scale . Any acute chronic illness , malignant disease fever know unknown origin exclude . Poorly control diabetes mellitus ( hemoglobin A1c great 8.5 % ) Uncontrolled hypertension define blood pressure great 160/100 Severe obesity define body mass index great 40 kg/m2 Current recent ( last 6 month ) user illicit drug ( may affect appetite , food intake , metabolism , and/or compliance protocol ) Any one planning initiate weightreduction diet subsequent six month Alcohol drug dependence currently precede 6 month . Significant liver function abnormality , define SGOT , SGPT alkaline phosphatase value great three time upper limit normal Clinical Pathology Laboratory serum bilirubin level great 1.5 mg/dl exclude .
